text: Pillar of Fire and Other Plays (1975) is a collection of three plays by Ray Bradbury: Pillar of Fire, Kaleidoscope, and The Foghorn. All are adaptations of his short stories of the same names. The genre of these works is science fiction. ==See also== * "The Fog Horn", short story * S is for Space, anthology which includes the short story "Pillar of Fire" ==External links== * * Category:1975 fiction books Category:1975 plays Category:Plays by Ray Bradbury Category:Books of plays
